::Spears::

She stood there,looking at Ramulus and the other bot.  She recognized 
him, but couldn't place him.  She let the tears roll down her cheeks 
as she watched them approach. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Starscream
> 
> Starscream laughed hard. One of the clones was dead. But he wanted 
> their leader out. He dodged their randomly shot bullets, and than 
> turned his jet pack on. He went right above Inferno, and shot 
rapidly 
> down on him.
> 
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Trainers
> 
> Prebon got upset. He saw Ramulus, but this other bot? This was not 
> part of the deal. But maybe....this bot was just small back up. 
Maybe 
> with him here, there was less chance of an ambush. This Ramulus 
must 
> be very dumb.
> 
> "What is the meaning of this? You were supposed to come alone 
> Ramulus! Why is he here?"
> 
> Meanwhile, Ignatius saw something he didn't like while he was 
gazing 
> with his piercing Eagle Eye's.
> 
> "What's wrong?" asked Hammer
> 
> "I'm not sure....but something's not right over there. Movement in 
> the bushed. I don't like it."
> 
> "Hmmm... maybe they were thinking the same we were thinking. This 
> Ramulus must be very smart. Ignatius, take to the skies and look 
over 
> everything carefully. Blaze, get a bit closer and see if you can 
> smell anything. Report back once you have anything."
> 
> Ignatius and Blaze left the group.
